subject: Soccer

Politics and Government
World Cup 2022 (Soccer)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Jack Warner, who resigned as vice president of FIFA and president of Concacaf, was a polarizing figure for decades.
snippet: Jack Warner, who resigned as vice president of FIFA and president of Concacaf, was a polarizing figure for decades.
